thread.title: Blog Post: PSA: Xbox Live Experiencing Issues, Players Unable To Access Digitally Purchased Content
thread.title_full: Blog Post: PSA: Xbox Live Experiencing Issues, Players Unable To Access Digitally Purchased Content

author: Javy Gwaltney
title: Blog Post: PSA: Xbox Live Experiencing Issues, Players Unable To Access Digitally Purchased Content
text:
PSA: Xbox Live Experiencing Issues, Players Unable To Access Digitally Purchased Content PSA by Javy Gwaltney   08:28 PM 915 Views 
Xbox Live is currently suffering from some unspecified issues at the moment, which include preventing players from accessing games they've bought from the network digitally. 
Xbox's official support twitter has tweeted that it is aware of the issue: The proper teams are aware that users are unable to launch purchased content. Keep up with the investigation here: https://t.co/99xfLMWcZW â€” Xbox Support (@XboxSupport) March 21, 2017 
Microsoft hasn't explained what the issue is or when it will be resolved, only that you can keep an eye on the status of Xbox Live here . 
We've reached out to Microsoft for comment and will update if we hear back. 
Email the author , or follow on Twitter , and Game Informer .
